thought: To craft a red_sandstone_wall, I need to place 6 red_sandstones in a 2x3 pattern on the crafting table. The first red_sandstone is located at slot 44, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
